codwawserver.gamename: Call of Duty: World at War

rconweb.description: values: Facepunch web panel, Rustadmin desktop and Rustadmin Online = 1, Rusty = 0.

serverlevel.description: values: Procedural Map, Barren, HapisIsland, SavasIsland

seed.description: range: 1-2147483647, used to reproduce a procedural map.

salt.description: range: unknown, used to recover a known setting from an existing map.

worldsize.description: default: 3000, range: 1000-6000, map size in meters.

tags.description: values: monthly, biweekly, weekly, vanilla, hardcore, softcore, pve, roleplay, creative, minigame, training, battlefield, broyale, builds, NA, SA, EU, WA, EA, OC, AF ( Doc: https://wiki.facepunch.com/rust/server-browser-tags )

serveradmins.description: Use 17-digit Steam IDs separated by commas to grant admin privileges to players.

steamsocket.description: Use Steam Socket. 0 = off; 1 = on. Use Steam Servers for network penetration. Enable this if you don't have a public IP but you want to allow players from outside your network to join your server. If disabled, only you and other players on your LAN can join. If you have a public IP, you do not need to enable this.
